FromTheBlog.title: Blog
FromTheBlog.description: Here are the latest blog articles. Discover the latest news, tips, and insights from our team.

extensible.title: Extensible
extensible.description: Extend the application's features to match your needs. Our team is here to assist you.

packages.title: Package Management
packages.description: Manage and version all your packages from one place. Track changes and debug more easily.

tools.title: Tools
tools.description: Aiop offers a suite of tools (Expanding) to assist you in maintenance, design, and production of packages.

customization.title: Customization
customization.description: Customize the behavior of Aiop and your projects to match your needs.

collaboration.title: Collaboration
collaboration.description: Work together on a project remotely. Share your packages, resources, and knowledge among teams. Gain productivity and quality.

Benefits.title: Benefits
Benefits.description: Aiop saves you time... a lot, period.

list.title: Infinite Packages
list.description: Aiop is designed to manage an unlimited number of packages. Use package nesting to manage complex packages.

list.title: 3 hours -> 5 seconds
list.description: On average, our users reduce the package generation time from 3 hours to just 7 seconds with Aiop.

list.title: Knowledge Sharing
list.description: Collaboration is at the core of Aiop. Share your declarations, packages, resources, and knowledge among teams. Gain clarity, productivity, and quality.

list.title: Debugging Speed
list.description: Trust in automatic package generation. Reduce the chances of errors slipping into your packages.

list.title: Quality Control
list.description: Ensure no surprises when generating your packages. Aiop allows you to validate your resources before generating them.

list.title: Versioning
list.description: Manage and version all your packages from one place. Track changes and trace them. Aiop also allows you to regenerate previous versions of your packages.

Clients.title: Developed by engineers for engineers
Clients.description: Initially, the tool is designed to generate packages specifically for embedded systems but should not be limited to that. Aiop is designed for and by software engineers, testers, delivery managers.

list.name: John Doe
list.description: John uses Aiop to generate packages for his simulation and testing environment. He will also be involved in modifying the project to add his features during development.

list.name: Robert Johnson
list.description: Robert uses Aiop to generate and modify packages for his simulation and testing environment.

list.name: Jane Smith
list.description: Jane initiated this project and uses the modifications made by developers and testers to generate packages.

list.name: Jarvis
list.description: The CI-CD will be able to launch package generation and perform continuous integration and continuous deployment.

Integrations.title: Integration
Integrations.description: Native integration of artifact registries and libraries.

Pricing.title: Pricing
Pricing.description: Start now with the free version! No credit card required.

compare.title: Feature Comparison
compare.description: For a detailed comparison and frequently asked questions, see our

tiers.name: Community
tiers.description: Start now! No credit card required. Perfect for trying out the tool.

tiers.name: Pro
tiers.description: For serious projects. Includes advanced features and dedicated support. The Pro version is not yet available. Sign up for our newsletter to be informed of its release.
mainFeatures: All features of the free version
Dedicated support in addition to community support

tiers.name: Team
tiers.description: Dedicated solution for a team and/or company. You have personalized assistance. Contact us to discuss the price.
mainFeatures: All features of the Pro version
Unlimited playbooks, no limits on users

list.question: Why pay for a subscription?
list.answer: Aiop is offered for free for personal projects and open-source projects. For professional projects, we charge a subscription to cover infrastructure and support costs. We also offer advanced features for teams and businesses.

list.question: Why do I need to create an account to use Aiop?
list.answer: For personal and open-source projects, you do not need to create an account. For professional projects, we need your personal information to create an Aiop cloud account and benefit from plugins. We do not sell your data to third parties. Your email address is used only to contact you about your Aiop account.

list.question: Do you offer promotions?
list.answer: Yes, we offer discounts for students and academics. If you believe your situation justifies a discount, please contact us at this email address.

product_waiting_list.title: Waiting List
product_waiting_list.description: For now, Aiop is in Beta version. To subscribe to the Pro version, please sign up for the waiting list by providing your email.
product_waiting_list.description2: You can still start using Aiop for free by clicking the button below.

modal.error: Uh oh! Something went wrong. Please try again or contact us directly by email: support@aiop.io
modal.success: Message sent! Thank you for your registration, we will notify you as soon as the Pro version is available.

email.title: Email
email.onerror: Please enter a valid email address.
email.description: Enter your email to be notified when the Pro version is released.

features.name: Check the integrity of installed resources from Artifactory and Nexus
Generate a PDF from a Markdown file
Ignore playbook files from the .amlignore file
Generate a package summary (aiop version, playbook version, aiop movements, post-build changes)
Implementation of the building steps principle (lint, pre-build, build, post-build, seal, deploy)
Implementation of the Custom Tasks system
Improve VSCode integration with built-in declaration validation schema
Compare two packages by commit and/or target
Make Pydantic the basis of typing for the entire application
Get the list of target systems and parameters by command and auto-completion
Perform a `dry-run` of the build generation
Create partial update installers TAR.GZ or RPM (Linux)
Use pyinstaller for packaging as a standalone executable
Create a vscode extension with AIOP and a schema
Core in Rust to improve speed
AI: Prefix errors reported by Aiop via Artificial Intelligence
AI: Interact with a Chatbot to manipulate declarations and assist in declaration generation
Create custom aliases in declarations to avoid repeating arguments
CI: Facilitate Aiop integration into CI
Hub: Create a Playbook example hub
Hub: Create a Custom Task example hub
Hub: Create a hub of examples of declarations to be placed directly in the playbooks
Cloud: Team roles and authorization management

schedule_demo.title: Discuss your project
schedule_demo.description: We could discuss your project and how Aiop can help you. We can also give you a demonstration of the Aiop solution and how it can help you in your business.
